Class MonteCarlo

  • java.lang.Object
    • MonteCarlo

  • public class MonteCarlo
extends java.lang.Object
    Models a circle on the ground and a square circumscribed around it, where raindrops can randomly fall.
    Version:
    29/11/2017
    Author:
    Kara I
